XHTMLFile - Class in epub.creator
ePub XHTMLFile Structure - All functions are self-explanatory They add informations into the XHTMLFile
XHTMLFile(String) - Constructor for class epub.creator.XHTMLFile
 
xhtmlPageTitle - Variable in class epub.creator.XHTMLFile
 
xml_encoding - Variable in class javacc.structure.XTM
Represent the XML encoding char set (in this parser is fixed to UTF-8)
xml_version - Variable in class javacc.structure.XTM
Represent the XML version of the file (in this parser is fixed to 1.0)
XTM - Class in javacc.structure
XTM is a specialization of the XML language, one of its derivates specifically designed to format information with an associative structure: XTM is the XML format variant specific for concept maps, semantic networks, knowledge bases, and in general, for logical and cognitive structures.
XTM() - Constructor for class javacc.structure.XTM
Creates an empty XTM structure
XTM(TopicMap) - Constructor for class javacc.structure.XTM
Creates an XTM structure specifying the XTM.topicMap

XTMParser(XTMParserTokenManager) - Constructor for class javacc.parsexml.XTMParser

XTMParserConstants - Interface in javacc.parsexml
